CreatePlayerStats: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PlayerStats (SaveSlotID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Intellect INTEGER DEFAULT 10, Charm INTEGER DEFAULT 10, Endurance INTEGER DEFAULT 50, Money INTEGER DEFAULT 30000000000, HeroineALiked INTEGER DEFAULT 0, HeroineBLiked INTEGER DEFAULT 0, HeroineCLiked INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CreateGameProgress: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS GameProgress (SaveSlotID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CurrentDay INTEGER DEFAULT 1)
